alert.note: Alert for Kimble (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:41PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kimble County through 1230 AM CDT... At 1141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cleo, or 8 miles north of Junction, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... London, Yates Crossing, Cleo and Us-83 Near The Kimble- Menard County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
